sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: In Greece, the bodies of 18 unidentified victims have been found after a forest fire and officials believe they may have crossed the border illegally.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Three at last liberated villagers in Ukraine described terror, thirst and starvation as war raged around their homes.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Franz Timmermans has resigned as vice president of the EU Commission to lead a social democrat green coalition in Dutch elections.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Spain's Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez has slammed the Football Federation chief Luis Rubiolas' apology following a scandalous World Cup kiss.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Οφησίες στην Ελλάδα λένε ότι οι σώματες των 18 άνθρωπων βρίσκονται στον Ναστινό Πάρκο του Ναρδίου με φωτιά που ασκούν σκοπές στο νορδό του χώρα.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Είναι σκοπή ότι οι αγόρες μπορούν να περπατήσουν την πόλη αλληλεγγύη πριν να βρεθούν σε έναν αγόρο.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Στην πυκαγιά της Αλεξανδρούπολης, σε επιτόπιο έλεγχο από στελέχη του Πυροδεστικού Σώματος στην ευρύτερη περιχή του Άβαντα εντοπίστηκαν ισορροί 18 ατόμων λυσίων παραπήγματος.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Με δεδομένο ότι από τις γύρω περιοχές δεν έχει υπάρξει καμία δήλωση εξαφάνισης ή αγνοωμένων κατοίκων, διερευνάται το ενδεχόμενο να πρόκειται για ανθρώπους που εισήλθαν παράτυπα στη χώρα μας.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Υπενθυοι AUTHORWAVE Amidst the steel on steel, front line fighting, terrified civilians, safe at last.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: The video released by the Ukrainian army's 47th brigade on social media recorded the moment of rescue and tales of survival. Немного подкопаем картофельки, то есть такая еда. 52 было в летку. Я вам скажу, у меня будут шикарные подарки.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Мне подарили пирожки с шелковицей, подарили три хлеба, подарила мама принесла букет троян, а кум принес полщачка бубликов, которые нашел у оккупантов.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Скоро увидимся.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Привет! For the people of Robotina, a chance to call loved ones, even as heavy shelling continued around the village that's seen two months of intense fighting. Ukrainian forces made tactically significant gains in western Zaporizhia region while continuing counteroffensive operations in the Donetsk-Zaporizhia region administrative border and in eastern Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Geolocated footage published on the 20th and the 21st of August indicates that Ukrainian forces reached central part of Robotene right here. It is situated about 10 kilometers south from Urihiv and broke through some Russian defenses south of Malatok-Machka, this direction. Ukrainian army reports entering Russian occupied village of Malato Khmelnytsky this direction Ukrainian army reports entering Russian occupied village of robot and a Russian sources stated the fighting here is ongoing the Institute for the study of war previously assessed that Ukrainian attacks on robot and are tactically significant because the Ukrainian advance in the area may allow Ukrainian forces to begin operating past the densest Russian minefields. Ukrainian advances across fields in this area likely confirm this assessment. Persistent Ukrainian advances in the Roboten area also likely aim to degrade Russian forces that have committed significant effort, resources and personnel to hold positions around robot in a DK Defense Ministry says the Russian military is highly likely forming a new 18th combined arms army from the other units currently operating in Harrison region it is likely to consist mostly of mobilized personnel and to focus on defensive security operations in the south of Ukraine Russia likely aims to free up more experienced units to fight on key axes. There is a realistic possibility that this has led to the recent redeployment of airborne forces from Kherson to the heavily contested Orykiv area.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Fire and rescue crews in Stepnihursk in Ukraine have become used to coming under fire while rescuing people.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: They call the four-kilometer road to the front line the highway of life.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: They've helped 5,000 residents escape along the muddy, shell-pocked route, often under attack themselves.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: We were hit not only by tanks, but by planes and mortars. We saw everything there.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: But at that time, when you pull a car or a bus with people, you won't throw it.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: You know that you need to pull it back, because there is another column behind.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: When Russia blocked one of the exits from the highway, the fire crews adapted and focused instead on helping those left behind.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: After the shells fall, they emerge from an improvised bomb shelter in what was once a water storage tank. The rescuers are exhausted after a year and a half of a war whose end is not in sight in the short or medium term. Two of their colleagues have lost their lives along the way.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The EU Commission's vice president and climate chief, Frans Timmermans, has resigned in a bid to run for prime minister in the Netherlands. The 62-year-old former Dutch foreign minister has been chosen to lead the Green Left in parliamentary elections in November.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The Dutch elections are wide open, with two new parties vying to become the biggest force in the nation, as traditional groups like the Christian Democrats face major challenges to maintain their standing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Timmermans will lead a broad centre-left coalition of Social Democrats and Greens.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Mark Rutte, the incumbent Prime Minister, has announced he won't stand.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The nation grieves with you.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: That's what US President Joe Biden told survivors of Hawaii's wildfires on Monday as he promised to help residents of the island of Maui recover after the deadliest wildfire in the United States in more than a century.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The president and his wife cut short their week-long holiday to comfort survivors of the devastating wildfires.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Lahaina was a historic town of 13,000 people and has been virtually destroyed by the flames.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: I also want all of you to know the country grieves with you, stands with you, and will do everything possible to help you recover, rebuild and respect culture and traditions when the rebuilding takes place.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The wildfires have claimed at least 114 lives with 850 people still missing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The flames moved so quickly that residents and visitors were caught off guard. Many were trapped in the streets or forced to jump into the ocean to escape.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: It's nearly two weeks since the fire started and Biden has come under attack from Republicans who claim he has not done enough to address the devastation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The White House says Biden delayed his trip so as not to distract officials and rescuers working on the ground.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Japan is set to release treated radioactive water from the Fukushima Daiichi nuclear power plant on Thursday, despite protests from neighboring countries and demands from China and South Korea to reconsider the decision.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: In Seoul, protesters took to the streets accusing Tokyo of jeopardizing the safety of South Koreans.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: China called the release of radioactive water a wrong decision and called on Japan to correct it.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Beijing says the ocean is a common property of all humankind and promised to take all necessary measures to safeguard the marine environment.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Japan has cooperated with the International Atomic Energy Agency in the plan to discharge treated water contaminated at the plant in 2011 when an earthquake and tsunami wrecked Fukushima, melting three reactors.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The water has been stored in a thousand tanks and treated with what's called an advanced liquid processing system. El agua ha sido guardada en mil tanques y tratada con lo que se llama un sistema de procesamiento de líquido avanzado.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: No es suficiente. Eso es lo que el ministro de Primavera de España, Pedro Sánchez,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: ha llamado a la apología del jefe de la Federación de Fútbol, tras el escándalo de la Copa Mundial de Sábado.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Luis Robiales publicó un mensaje en el viernes diciendo que estaba completamente equivocado.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: y que por tanto tiene que continuar dando pasos el señor Rubiales, para aclarar lo que vimos todos a través de los medios de comunicación. forward Jenny Hermoso on the lips. On Instagram, Hermoso was filmed saying she didn't like it but later defended him in a statement.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Football fans in Spain turned out in their thousands on Monday night to celebrate their side winning the Women's World Cup. The victorious players toured Madrid in an open-topped bus, drinking in the euphoric atmosphere.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Olga Carmona's strike in the 29th minute sealed glory for the Spaniards in Sydney, causing heartbreak for an England side who had been favourites to win.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The Spanish captain joined the celebrations, despite learning after the match that her father had passed away just hours before the final.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The players arrived at the celebration spot near midnight local time, some three hours after with confetti being sprinkled onto the stage and players and staff and fans singing, we are the champions.
